rooms.description: The central living room adjacent to the courtyard, designed with Mediterranean aesthetics using warm colors and textures, incorporating indoor/outdoor flow.
An integrated kitchen and dining area that emphasizes open space, natural light, and seamless connectivity with the living room.
A dedicated workspace designed for productivity and tranquility, located in a quiet corner of the apartment. Features built-in storage and soundproofing for privacy.
Private bedroom suite with ensuite bathroom, offering a secluded retreat and personalized decor inspired by Mediterranean farmhouse style.
A private gym integrated into the apartment featuring durable flooring, modern fitness equipment, ample storage for exercise gear, and natural light from large windows.

An expansive central courtyard that acts as a communal living space, designed to encourage interaction with nature while adhering to Vastu principles by orienting entrances and water elements appropriately.

openings.description: The main entrance located on the eastern side, optimized for Vastu alignment by ensuring a welcoming and auspicious entry.
South-facing window to maximize natural sunlight in the living room and kitchen area, adhering to traditional Mediterranean design principles.
North-facing window installed in the home office for balanced light and calm ambience.
